title: CE60111: Viscous Fluid Flow - Quick Facts
text:
CE60111
Course name | Viscous Fluid Flow
Offered by | Civil Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to inviscid and viscous fluid flow; fundamental equations of viscous flow; continuity equation; Navier-Stokes equations; Couette flows; twoand three-dimensional boundary layers; similarity solution for two-dimensional flow; free shear flow; approximate integral method; stability of flow; concept of small disturbance stability; linearized stability of parallel viscous flow; parametric effects in the linear stability theory; transition to turbulence.
